author: bencomic

left.text: so if I'm getting this right, weed is heavier than water?

right.text: a leaf (normal mind) is brittle and weak, but it drifts and floats. a stone (stoner, of course) is heavy and sinks

left.text: ANALOGY DUMBHOORJ! wildweasel: I'm amazed you want to mod this channel :P

right.text: you're reading too far into it

left.text: wildweasel, doesn't that suggest that you get lost without pot, floating downstream, eventually falling over a waterfall?

title: sink or swim: law of the wildweasel, part 3
